shits <- system.file(
    'extdata',
    'araport11',
    'araport11_subset9.tab',
    package='phylostratr'
) %>%
  load_hittable %>%
  get_max_hit

shits %>%
    dplyr::group_by(staxid) %>%
    dplyr::summarize(n = n()) -> x
